resources.string: Cristiano Ronaldo is a Portuguese professional footballer who plays as a forward for AL NASSIR and captains the Portugal national team.
Lionel Messi is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a forward for INTER MIAMI and captains the Argentina national team.
Neymar is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a forward for Ligue 1 club AL HILAL and the Brazil national team.
Mason Mount is an English professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Premier League club Chelsea and the England national team.
Karim Benzema is a French professional footballer who plays as a striker for La Liga club AL ITHAD and the France national team.
